mapper.select:
select * from (select rownum as rnum, sub.* from (select distinct lecture_id, lecture_class, lecture_name, professor_name from Lecture join LectureTime using (lecture_id, lecture_class)
where lecture_name like '%'||#{searchData}||'%'
where professor_name like '%'||#{searchData}||'%'
order by lecture_id) sub) where rnum >= #{startIdx} and rnum <= #{endIdx}
mapper.insert: insert into LectureApply (lecture_id, user_id, lecture_class, is_president) values (#{lectureId}, #{userId}, #{lectureClass}, #{isPresident})
